translations: 可避免的；可作为无效的；可回避的

sentences.translation: 这场悲剧完全可以避免。

sentences.sentence: Many deaths from heart disease are actually avoidable.
sentences.translation: 许多因心脏病造成的死亡实际上是可以避免的。

sentences.sentence: People living in the most deprived areas are four times more prone to die from avoidable causes than counterparts in more affluent places.
sentences.translation: 最贫困地区的人死于可避免死因的几率是较富裕地区的人的4倍。
